description.original: Supercharge your canvas experience! Create presentations, flowcharts and more!
description.translation: Supercharge your canvas experience! Create presentations, flowcharts and more!

dict.Notice(\"Reload obsidian to apply the ch: Notice("Reload obsidian to apply the changes.")
dict.Notice(\"No start node found. Please mar: Notice("No start node found. Please mark a node as a start node through the popup menu.")

dict..setDesc('When enabled, the arrow will b: .setDesc('When enabled, the arrow will be rotated to the direction of the edge if the pathfinding method is set to "Direct".')
dict..setDesc(\"The resolution of the grid wh: .setDesc("The resolution of the grid when using the A* path style. The lower the value, the more precise the path will be. But it will also take longer to calculate.")
dict..setDesc(\"When enabled, the A* path sty: .setDesc("When enabled, the A* path style will be updated live while dragging the edge.")
.setDesc("When enabled, the A* path style will be rounded.")

dict..setDesc(\"The margin between the cloned: .setDesc("The margin between the cloned node and the source node.")
dict..setDesc(\"The step size for expanding t: .setDesc("The step size for expanding the node.")
dict..setDesc(\"When enabled, the height of t: .setDesc("When enabled, the height of the node will snap to the grid.")
dict..setDesc(\"When enabled, a group that is: .setDesc("When enabled, a group that is collapsed show its border while dragging a node.")
dict..setDesc(\"When enabled, \"Set Start Nod: .setDesc("When enabled, "Set Start Node" will show in node popup.")
dict..setDesc(\"When enabled, the slide will: .setDesc("When enabled, the slide will have padding inside.")

dict..setDesc(\"When enabled, the slides will: .setDesc("When enabled, the slides will zoom without padding.")
dict..setDesc(\"When enabled, closed portals: .setDesc("When enabled, closed portals will retain their size.")
dict..setDesc(\"When enabled, edges into disa: .setDesc("When enabled, edges into disabled portals will be shown.")
